title: Navaratna Lotus Karnaphoolu: Auspicious Nine-Gem Earrings
features: Intricately crafted Lotus design, hand-set Navaratna gemstones representing the nine planets for astrological benefits. The center features a diamond-studded halo adding brilliance. The gold showcases detailed filigree work around each gemstone setting. Traditional push-back closure ensures secure wear.
occasions: or any special occasion where traditional elegance is desired. A meaningful gift for events like Seemantham or a milestone birthday.
description: This pair of Karnaphoolu blends the ancient tradition of Navaratna jewelry with a graceful Lotus design. Each gemstone is carefully selected and set to maximize its astrological power. The high-quality gold and meticulous craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting beauty. Wearing Navaratna jewelry is believed to bring health, wealth, and prosperity.
